Medium sized map, one above ground level and two below ground levels, accessible by an elevator shaft and stairwell.  Also a secret area, if you can find it.  Have fun!

Big thank you goes out to KizzBizz for making this map and for giving us hours of fun in Zombie Mod playing it! Without him this wouldn't have been possible!
=============================================================================================================================================================

### UPDATE ON 1/13/12:  : Fixed the custom decals not showing up in-game and the extreme glossyness, everything should be 100% now! Sorry for the 19 of you who downloaded versions 2-3, once you download v4 you should be good to go. Sorry!

- CHANGES:
- Took out Skybox (credits to KizzBizz still in-game). 
- New pool of water in Terrorist spawn.
- Cage platform above Terrorist spawn is now broken open allowing players to jump down and across to the other platform. 
- Can't glitch through wood barricades anymore. 
- Two more wood barricades added (sealing off the broken platform and upper cavern).
- Darker environment for a more tense/creepy gameplay experience. 
- Changed/moved security room buttons (with new door mechanics).
- Several props added and replaced compared to the older version.  

Thank you for downloading and supporting the Paranormal Containment Project.
============================================================================
----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Join our Steam group and play with us in our 50 slot ZombieHunt server:
[http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ParanormalContainmentProject](http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ParanormalContainmentProject "Official ||pCp|| Steam Group")

Officeattack is a fun zombie map I crafted back when C0ldfyr3 remade the nemod zombie plugin. It grew a cult following on our Zombie server and was created from the ground up to be a pure zombie map. 

No VRAD compiling, so it'll always be bright and never dark regardless of what zombie_dark is set to. Enjoy!

simple cs_office with 64 for slots for zombie mod based server with player collision enabled.

slightly edited map in terms of prop physics; you can use almost all props on the map to barricade, block, slow down zombies.

both unlimited and limited ammo supported.

try it yourself.

Hi i made a ZOMBIE map,but you can play it without the mod.
The map can be played with bots.

If you want you can play it like a FY map

Map created by - Error.ocx
Compile time - About 10 minutes.
Notes: This map was strictly made for the Zombie Mod plugin for Counter-Strike: Source. I really wouldn't recommend running this on a regualr server becuase both T and CT spawns are right beside each other. This is my first map and I hope you enjoy it.

- Thanks to c0ldfyr3 for created such an awesome plugin. www.zombiemod.com
- Thanks to [Ao1]Something[Atd] for helping me get orientated with the map.
- Thank you for playing my map.

=========================
Changes in version 4
=========================

- Fixed textures here and there.
- Fixed a few exploits.
- Removed the tubes because of annoying tube camping and replace them with pipes.
- The ramps in the fort area are breakable.
- The bridge in the fort area is breakable.
- Added a stack of boxes that takes a trickjump to get too, hopefully not overpowered. "As far as i've seen it's not."
- Added a few windows in the office area.
- Made the two impossible office rooms a little more balanced.
- Changed a room in the office into a kitchen.
- Added some detail here and there.
- Added a few player clip brushes to the branches of the trees. Nothing impossible. Just to make a few of the spots easier to sit on.
- Changed the sky.
- Added a Vphysics clip brush to the small area the leads to the secret room so people don't shoot props into it to make it impossible to get into.
- Removed the wall to jump duck into to get to the secret room. Now just walk forward.
- No more ducking to get the the correct teleports. The wall was removed.
- Teleport locations changed, because i'm evil like that.
- Completely remade the OCX rave room. It's about three times the size as it is in b3.
- Added more cool/trippy effects to the rave room. "Ohhhhh Yeahhhh".

NOTE: There could be a few things that I have forgotten. But I started version four about six months ago. I became uninterested and WoW took over. Since then I have quit and decided to finish up the map. What this version is, is my attempt at a final release. I aimed at fixing alot of the problems and exploits in the map. While a few things were changed, most of the map it's self remains looking the same. Though I would recommend this version any day over beta 3.

=========================

This was my first map and I have improved alot since. So cut me some slack. =P

Compile time - About 10 minutes.
Notes: This map was strictly made for the Zombie Mod plugin for Counter-Strike: Source. I really woulden't recommend running this on a regualr server becuase both T and CT spawns are right beside each other. This is my first map and I hope you enjoy it.

- Thanks to c0ldfyr3 for created such an awesome plugin. www.zombiemod.com
- Thanks to [Ao1]Something[Atd] for helping me get orientated with the map.
- Thank you for playing my map.

=========================
Changes in beta 3
=========================
- Removed more useless props.
- Improved map FPS even more.
- Ladder to tree house improved even more.
- Each ceiling glass strip in pool area now has 2k health.
- Rave room music should work now.
- Added and fixed alot of bugs.
- Added alot of detail too the map.
- Cleaned up some of the clutter here and there.

NOTE: This map has been out awhile, I slacked on putting it on here, I don't ever remember why. But here it is. I decided to update it because I still saw servers using b2. b3 is a vast improvement, like how b2 was a big improvement over b1. I am currently working on V4...5 months later...I know...I know. I'm hoping V4 might be the final version of my map. But I still don't know. Guess we will see. :)

=========================

This was intended to be a mixture of defend and escape gameplay like the Atix maps. At the moment it only area is the hospital roof but other areas from the campaign may be added later on.

Changelog v2.2:
-Added tank boss, will randomly occur (may not at all) each round and will select one zombie automatically
-Made escape more difficult, more action oriented
-Minor nerfs / buffs to hold positions to make them more fair
-Added L4D music / sounds
-Minor improvements to the 3D skybox
-Players will have their ammo refilled every 40 seconds (for limited ammo servers)

Changelog v2.3:
-Made tank weaker
-Made escape slightly easier
-Added more hold spots
-All hold spots changed to be better for Humans / Zombies
-Fixed some players not getting ammo refilled

Notes:
Because of the changes I have made you may find some major bugs or problems with the gameplay.
Please report any problems you see and I will try my best to fix them.

Some of the music that plays can be controlled by the music slider in CS:S options.

I will probably release another version later on with a better skybox and more hold points / areas if the map becomes popular.


>>>>This map REQUIRES NoBlock<<<<
---------------------------------

Can You Survive?
==================

Hold out on top of Mercy Hospital until the choppers arrive! You are stranded on top of the roof of the tallest building in the city. The military is about to bomb the place, but you were able to radio them for help and they could spare three choppers to send. Survive long enough and escape before the whole place is blown up!

### About the map:

- Made from scratch, no copying / porting of any content

- 64 spawns points

- Color correction for improved visuals and lightning effects

- Rain ambiance

- Fog

- Cubemaps

- Three helicopters

- Nuke!

- Helicopters crash if zombies take over (so the round actually ends!)

- Modified / added some spots to improve gameplay for zombie mod


### Specifics:

Hold out for three minutes. Three choppers arrive, each one passing by two drop off points. When the choppers arrive, a hurt box, whose only point is to slow down zombies, activates, giving everyone a chance to make a run for it! If a terrorist (zombie) is detected on a helicopter past a certain point, the chopper will blow up.


##### Future plans:

- Finish bomb defuse version...

- Make chopper explosions look better

- Make whatever tweaks necessary to balance gameplay

- Improve 3d skybox

zm_novum__final_jbg

- new camp spots
- made smaller
- night and day versions
- start in west or east side of map ( randomly decicded at start of round )

Zm_novum_v3 changelog - more optimized - new area - more balanced In this new version of novum i have created a whole new area to the map, the new area has new areas for humans to barricade and climb. Also in this new version i have improved the gameplay in the old parts of the map. I have made them much more balanced, i have player cliped many parts like the windows which people were using to get to really hard places. You can see some of the changes in these sceenshots:

Zm_novum_v2

This contains an outdoor area with a single chokepoint leading from one outdoor area to another. It also contains two indoor sectors, there is only one entrance to each of the indoor sectors.

||||UPDATE||||

- Updated Player Clips ( Cant Access Lower Building Roofs )
- Removed Concrete Tubes
- Removed/Added Props

ZM_NOVUM_FINAL

FEATURES

- Totally remade
- More realistic
- Cubemaps
- 2 Secrets
- More Balanced
- 3D Skybox
- Ambient sounds
- New areas
- New camping spots
